ExtraOpener: ^Wow you really <color=red>wrote a lot on the page!</color>
^There's a lot to unpack and hopefully your mind is at ease after writing!
^And if not, that's ok!, you've still managed to get a lot down!
NotAsMuch: ^Not much to write there? That's no worries!
^Just as long as that's what you need to write Hopefully, your mind is at ease!
^And if not, that's ok, you've still completed the exercise!
main: ^Thank you for trying out my Mindfulness Programme! <color=red>Feel free to comeback to repeat the programme! </color>
^Have you felt positively since starting the exercise?
YESOPTION: ^Then I'm glad my programme has managed to work for you, throughout all this!
^I look forward to seeing you back here again!
NOOPTION: ^I'm a little disappointed that it hasn't worked for you
^Perhaps the next time around it'll be a more pleasent experience for you!
